bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of chuang 瘡 , sores, that develops either to the side of or below the fingernails, with red swelling, heat and pain, and emitting pus or water. In some instances a red flesh protrusion emerges, and the fingernail is raised. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 35: 甲疽之狀，瘡皮厚，甲錯剝起是也 , “The appearance of nail impediment - illness : The skin around the sores is thick and flaky, and slightly elevated”.
